formulas.name: Get_CustomerData_Latitude
Get_CustomerData_Longitude
formulas.expression: IF( AND( FIND('@', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value}) > 0, FIND(',', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value})) > 0, FIND(',', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value}, FIND(',', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value})) + 1) > 0 ), IF( ISNUMBER( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value}, FIND(',', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value})) + 1, FIND(',', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value}, FIND(',', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), VALUE( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value}, FIND(',', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value})) + 1, FIND(',', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value}, FIND(',', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_CompanyData_Company_Google_Maps.value})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), 0 ), 0 )

formulas.name: GetAssetMapLatitude
GetAssetMapLongitude
formulas.expression: IF( AND( FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value}) > 0, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) > 0, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) + 1) > 0 ), IF( ISNUMBER( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) + 1, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), VALUE( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) + 1, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!Asset_Map.value}, FIND('@', {!Asset_Map.value})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), 0 ), 0 )

textTemplates.name: tpl_Address_AssetCity
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name, code__c from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!editor_Asset_Province.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Address_AssetKecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!func_Address_GetAssetCity}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Address_AssetKelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!func_Address_GetAssetKecamatan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_AddressDataCompany_City
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name, code__c from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!editor_AddressDataCompany_Company_Province.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_AddressDataCompany_Kecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!func_AddressDataCompany_GetCity}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_AddressDataCompany_Kelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!func_AddressDataCompany_GetKecamatan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Asset_ZipCode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!func_Address_GetAssetKelurahan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_CompanyData_City
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name, code__c from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!editor_CompanyData_Province.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_CompanyData_IndustryGroup
textTemplates.text: Select attributes_industry_group_description__c, count(parent_id_formula__c) from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where parent_id_formula__c = '{!editor_CompantyData_Economy_Sector.selectedChoiceValues}' group by attributes_industry_group_description__c

textTemplates.name: tpl_CompanyData_IndustryType
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, name__c from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where attributes_industry_group_description__c = '{!funcS_CompanyData_IndustryGroup}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_CompanyData_Kecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!func_CompanyData_City_Kabupaten}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_CompanyData_Kelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!func_CompanyData_Kecamatan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_CompanyData_Zipcode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!func_CompanyData_Kelurahan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Domicile_Zip_Code
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!func_GetSelectedDomicileKelurahanId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_DomicileCity
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name, code__c from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!Contact_Domicile_Province.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_DomicileKecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!func_GetSelectedDomicileCityId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_DomicileKelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!func_GetSelectedDomicileKecamatanId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_EmergencyContact_City
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name, code__c from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!editor_Emergency_Contact_Province.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_EmergencyContact_Kecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!func_EmergencyContact_GetCity}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_EmergencyContact_Kelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!func_EmergencyContact_GetKecamatan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_EmergencyContact_ZipCode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!func_EmergencyContact_GetKelurahan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_Legal_Zip_Code
textTemplates.text: select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!func_GetSelectedKelurahanId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_LegalCity
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name, code__c from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!Contact_Legal_Province.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_LegalKecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!func_GetSelectedCityId}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_LegalKelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!func_GetSelectedKecamatanId}'
